# Inactive: Data & AI

These agents live in `inactive/agents/` and can be activated by moving them into `agents/`.

[‚Üê Back to Inactive Agent Library](inactive-library.html)

| Agent | Category | Model | Summary |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `ai-engineer` | data-ai | opus | Designs production LLM, RAG, and generative AI systems with robust tooling and orchestration. |
| `data-engineer` | data-ai | sonnet | Designs resilient ETL, warehouse, and streaming data platforms for analytics workloads. |
| `data-scientist` | data-ai | haiku | Delivers actionable insights via optimized SQL, statistical analysis, and clear narratives. |
| `database-admin` | data-ai | sonnet | Keeps databases reliable through backups, replication, security, and incident-ready runbooks. |
| `database-optimizer` | data-ai | sonnet | Elevates database performance with tuned queries, indexing strategies, and migration planning. |
| `ml-engineer` | data-ai | sonnet | Ships ML pipelines, model serving, and monitoring safely into production environments. |
| `mlops-engineer` | data-ai | opus | Automates ML infrastructure with pipelines, experiment tracking, registries, and retraining workflows. |
| `mongodb-expert` | data-ai | sonnet | MongoDB specialist for schema design, indexing, and performance tuning. |
| `openai-api-expert` | data-ai | sonnet | OpenAI API integration specialist for responses, tools, and embeddings. |
| `postgres-expert` | data-ai | sonnet | PostgreSQL specialist for schema design, indexing, and query tuning. |
| `prompt-engineer` | data-ai | opus | Crafts, tests, and iterates prompts that deliver reliable outputs across diverse LLMs. |
| `pytorch-expert` | data-ai | sonnet | PyTorch specialist for model training, inference, and optimization. |
| `scikit-learn-expert` | data-ai | sonnet | Scikit-learn specialist for classical ML modeling and pipelines. |
| `sql-pro` | data-ai | sonnet | Creates performant SQL, analyzes execution plans, and designs normalized schemas across major RDBMSs. |
